sentence.Network_en: We were very adult about it. We discussed it rationally over a drink.
sentence.Network_cn: 在这件事上我们表现得很成熟。我们一边喝酒一边心平气和地谈了谈。

sentence.Network_en: It can be very hard to think rationally when you're feeling so vulnerable and alone.
sentence.Network_cn: 人在脆弱和孤独的时候很难理智地思考。

sentence.Network_en: We are determined to set up a complete, rationally distributed scientific and technological research system.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们一定要建成布局合理、相互配套的科研体系.

entry.def: Rational decisions and thoughts are based on reason rather than on emotion.

example.ex: He's asking you to look at both sides of the case and come to a rational decision...
example.tran: 他是要求你看到问题的两面后再作出理性的决定。

example.ex: Mary was able to short-circuit her stress response by keeping her thoughts calm and rational.
example.tran: 玛丽能够保持头脑清醒理智，因而迅速做出反应。

entry.def: A rational person is someone who is sensible and is able to make decisions based on intelligent thinking rather than on emotion.

example.ex: Did he come across as a sane rational person?...
example.tran: 他看起来是一个正常而理智的人吗？

example.ex: Rachel looked calmer and more rational now.
example.tran: 雷切尔现在看上去更加平静、更加理智了。

auth_sentence.content: I can't claim that I was thinking rationally.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: I can't claim that I was thinking rationally.

auth_sentence.content: You might think such people would act very rationally.
auth_sentence.res_content: You might think such people would act very rationally.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: You might think such people would act very rationally.

auth_sentence.content: You lose all balance and ability to think rationally.

Sentence.sentence: Many policy measures to control obesity（肥胖症）assume that people consciously and rationally choose what and how much they eat and therefore focus on providing information and more access to healthier foods," note the two researchers.
